snippet: One organization called the legal process for handling misconduct allegations a “facade” intended to try to stave off a war crimes investigation....
abstract: Israeli and Palestinian rights organizations question credibility of Israel’s investigation into possible military misconduct in 2014 war in Gaza; left-wing Israeli group B'Tselem issues report calling process 'facade' to avoid International Criminal Court inquiry; military rejects report as unprofessional and biased.
lead_paragraph: One organization called the legal process for handling misconduct allegations a “facade” intended to try to stave off a war crimes investigation.

headline.main: Rights Groups Criticize Israeli Inquiry Into 2014 Gaza War
headline.print_headline: Rights Groups Condemn Pace and Intent of Israeli Inquiry Into 2014 Gaza War

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
